tr_quotes.quote: Yolculuk bizi kendimize geri getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek istiyorsan, seyahat etmelisin.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahat etmek yaşadığını hissetmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Cristian Andersen

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey zekayı seyahat etmek kadar geliştirmez.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Zola

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat ya cesur bir maceradır ya da hiçbir şey!
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Her şey kötüye gittiğinde kendine bir tatil ısmarla.
tr_quotes.author: Betty Williams

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahatin önündeki tek engel kapının eşiğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Bosna Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Senede bir defa daha önce hiç görmediğin bir yere git.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Gezmek ve yer değiştirmek akla yeni bir dinçlik getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Para harcayarak sizi zengin yapacak tek şey seyahat etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk gidilen yolun üzerindedir, yolun sonunda değil.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktetos

tr_quotes.quote: Gezgin bir yere varmak için değil, keşfetmek için seyahat eder.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Macera tehlikeli sanıyorsan, rutini dene; öldürücüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Bilmediğin bir yola gitmek bilmediğin bir yönünü keşfetmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Buber

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşa, seyahat et, maceraya atıl, şükret ve asla pişman olma.
tr_quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyayı dolaşın. Görebileceğiniz bütün rüyaların en muhteşemi!
tr_quotes.author: ay Bradbury

tr_quotes.quote: Yolculuğun hedefi gideceği yer değil, göreceğin yeniliklerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Miller

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk vardığınız bir durak değil, bir seyahat biçimidir.
tr_quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi geride bırakana kadar seyahat maceraya dönüşmez.
tr_quotes.author: Marty Rubin

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahat gençlerde eğitimin, yaşlılarda da görgünün bir parçasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat bir kitaptır ve gezip görmeyenler hep aynı sayfayı okur.
tr_quotes.author: St. Agustine

tr_quotes.quote: Turistler nereye gittiklerini, gezginler nereye gideceklerini bilemezler.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Theroux

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar uzağa gidersem kendime o kadar çok yakınlaşıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Andrew McCarthy

tr_quotes.quote: Her şey bir yana, her seyahat bir tedavidir, bir sıçrama ve kendine gelmedir.
tr_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahat için yaptığın yatırım kendin için yaptığın en iyi yatırımdır.
tr_quotes.author: Matthew Karsten

tr_quotes.quote: Gezgin önüne ne çıkarsa onu görür, ama turist neyi görmek istiyorsa onu.
tr_quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

tr_quotes.quote: Gittiğin yerlerden sadece yeni hatıralar al ve sadece ayak izlerini bırak.
tr_quotes.author: Chief Seattle

tr_quotes.quote: Kıyıyı gözden kaybetmeye cesaret etmedikçe insan, yeni okyanuslar keşfedemez.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya bir kitaptır. Seyahat etmeyenler sadece bir sayfasını okurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanı tanımak için, kendisiyle yol arkadaşlığı edin
tr_quotes.author: Şinasi

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni bir dil konuşmak; yeni bir dünyanın ve kültürün kapılarını açmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Frantz Fanon

tr_quotes.quote: Mesele son durağının neresi olduğu değil, nasıl anıların ve yaşanmışlıkların olduğudur!
tr_quotes.author: Penelope Riley

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahat etme; düşüncelerimizi değiştirmek değil, ön yargılarımızdan kurtulmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anatole France

tr_quotes.quote: Gezmek insanı alçakgönüllü yapar. Dünyada aslında ne kadar da küçük bir yer kapladığımızı görmüş oluruz.
tr_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

tr_quotes.quote: Uzaklara gittikten sonra tamamen değişmiş biri olarak dönmek gerçek bir mucize.
tr_quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

tr_quotes.quote: Uzaklara gitmek, denizler, sınırlar, ülkeler, inançlar aşmak fırsatı çıktığı zaman hiç duraksama.
tr_quotes.author: Amin Maalouf

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yolculuğun en iyi ölçüsü katettiğin kilometreler değil, yolculuk sırasında edindiğin arkadaşlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Tim Cahill

tr_quotes.quote: Gezmek yaşamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek istiyorsan seyahat etmelisin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir garip seyyahım ama kendime göçerim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahat etmek evrim geçirmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir yol yoktur ki sonu olmasın!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat ya cesur bir mecaradır ya da hiçbir şey!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece gezen yeni yollar keşfeder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Okuyabildiğin kadar oku, gezebildiğin kadar gez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahat insanın dünyasını genişletir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey zekayı seyahat etmek kadar geliştirmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yolculuk bizi kendimize geri getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yolculuğa çıkmak her bedele ve fedakârlığa değer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat varılacak yer değil, yolculuktur…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gözlem yapmayan bir gezgin kanatsız bir kuş gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seyahat etmek sana tolere etmeyi öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir garip seyyahım ama kendime göçerim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En uzun yolculuklar, küçük bir adımla başlar
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk bir varış noktası değil, yolculuğun kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hareket etmeyen zincirlerini fark edemez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it
en_quotes.author: Rosalia de Castro

en_quotes.quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: People will travel anywhere for good food - it's crazy
en_quotes.author: Rene Redzepi

en_quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it
en_quotes.author: George A. Moore

en_quotes.quote: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world
en_quotes.author: Damon Albarn

en_quotes.quote: Travel by car or by bike! It helps to avoid walking too much and hurting your feet
en_quotes.author: Jeanne Damas

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of reading is that it lets you travel in a way you could never know
en_quotes.author: Alek Wek

en_quotes.quote: The person attempting to travel two roads at once will get nowhere
en_quotes.author: Xun Kuang

en_quotes.quote: I am learning that in life it is OK to travel in darkness, not knowing what your next move is
en_quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

en_quotes.quote: Being in a band is like a small family. You travel together, make music, and share time with each other
en_quotes.author: Mohit Chauhan

en_quotes.quote: Besides, I'm a gypsy at heart and I like to travel around
en_quotes.author: Reba McEntire

en_quotes.quote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world
en_quotes.author: John Muir

en_quotes.quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: If time travel were possible, you still wouldn't be able to change the past - it's already happened!
en_quotes.author: Sean M. Carroll

en_quotes.quote: I love to photograph the gorgeous landscapes when I travel
en_quotes.author: Blake Lively

en_quotes.quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: How often I found where I should be going only by setting out for somewhere else
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: What does it mean to pre-board? Do you get on before you get on?
en_quotes.author: George Carlin

en_quotes.quote: Writing and travel broaden your ass if not your mind and I like to write standing up
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: Many a trip continues long after movement in time and space have ceased
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather have huge success and huge failures than travel in the middle of the road
en_quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

en_quotes.quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo
en_quotes.author: Al Gore

en_quotes.quote: I get a friend to travel with me... I need somebody to bring me back to who I am. It's hard to be alone
en_quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

en_quotes.quote: Travelling expands the mind rarely
en_quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

en_quotes.quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home
en_quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

en_quotes.quote: Let me be a free man - free to travel, free to stop, free to work
en_quotes.author: Chief Joseph

en_quotes.quote: Travel and society polish one, but a rolling stone gathers no moss, and a little moss is a good thing on a man
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs
en_quotes.author: Susan Sontag

en_quotes.quote: I have a secret project which adds four hours every day to the 24 hours we have. There's a bit of time travel involved
en_quotes.author: Sundar Pichai

en_quotes.quote: Even if it turns out that time travel is impossible, it is important that we understand why it is impossible
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Just got back from a pleasure trip: I took my mother-in-law to the airport
en_quotes.author: Henny Youngman

en_quotes.quote: Travel like a pro, not like a hobo. That's my motto
en_quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

en_quotes.quote: I travel, I read, I write, I have other lives. But when I have a camera, I know that's my country, my island
en_quotes.author: Leos Carax

en_quotes.quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware
en_quotes.author: Martin Buber

en_quotes.quote: Anytime you introduce volatility, it is not good for business and not good for travel
en_quotes.author: Dara Khosrowshahi

en_quotes.quote: The land created me. I'm wild and lonesome. Even as I travel the cities, I'm more at home in the vacant lots
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Airplanes may kill you, but they ain't likely to hurt you
en_quotes.author: Satchel Paige

en_quotes.quote: If all difficulties were known at the outset of a long journey, most of us would never start out at all
en_quotes.author: Dan Rather

en_quotes.quote: Time travel is such a magic concept
en_quotes.author: Matt Smith

en_quotes.quote: Rome is the city of echoes, the city of illusions, and the city of yearning
en_quotes.author: Giotto di Bondone

en_quotes.quote: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit
en_quotes.author: Frank Borman

en_quotes.quote: Ah! Young people, travel if you can, and if you cannot - travel all the same!
en_quotes.author: Jules Verne

en_quotes.quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself
en_quotes.author: Danny Kaye

en_quotes.quote: Restore human legs as a means of travel. Pedestrians rely on food for fuel and need no special parking facilities
en_quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

en_quotes.quote: When I travel, I feel more like a nomad than a tourist
en_quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

en_quotes.quote: The most useful form of time travel would be to go back a year or two and rectify the mistakes we made
en_quotes.author: Matt Lucas

en_quotes.quote: I want to travel. Maybe I'll end up living in Norway, making cakes
en_quotes.author: Eva Green

en_quotes.quote: Time travel is a wonderful thing, isn't it?
en_quotes.author: Bradley Walsh

en_quotes.quote: The traveller has reached the end of the journey!
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really
en_quotes.author: Dhani Jones

en_quotes.quote: The best education I have ever received was through travel
en_quotes.author: Lisa Ling

en_quotes.quote: Hurt leads to bitterness, bitterness to anger, travel too far that road and the way is lost
en_quotes.author: Terry Brooks

en_quotes.quote: To read a writer is for me not merely to get an idea of what he says, but to go off with him and travel in his company
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot
en_quotes.author: Werner Herzog

en_quotes.quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating
en_quotes.author: Felix Baumgartner

en_quotes.quote: When the traveler goes alone he gets acquainted with himself
en_quotes.author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

en_quotes.quote: I always travel with a fun skirt, a go-to dress you can dress up or down; walking heels & flats are a must
en_quotes.author: Ashley Nell Tipton

en_quotes.quote: But you can travel on for ten thousand miles, and still stay where you are
en_quotes.author: Harry Chapin

en_quotes.quote: I want to travel all over India
en_quotes.author: Karthi

en_quotes.quote: The only thing I like about air travel is it gives me time to read
en_quotes.author: Jane Lindskold

en_quotes.quote: Travelers never think that they are the foreigners
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: It's wonderful to learn about new cultures and to be able to travel easily to so many countries
en_quotes.author: Stephen A. Schwarzman

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel and go to dance classes whenever I get time
en_quotes.author: Radhika Apte

en_quotes.quote: Spontaneity is what travel is all about
en_quotes.author: Zach Anner

en_quotes.quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon
en_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

en_quotes.quote: Every perfect traveler always creates the country where he travels
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: I have just returned from Boston. It is the only thing to do if you find yourself up there
en_quotes.author: Fred Allen

en_quotes.quote: I love short trips to New York; to me it is the finest three-day town on earth
en_quotes.author: James Cameron

en_quotes.quote: I have amazing memories of being able to travel and being able to have family all over the world
en_quotes.author: Lily Collins

en_quotes.quote: Science does not just drive space travel - space travel also drives science
en_quotes.author: Leroy Chiao

en_quotes.quote: We found that travel, especially online travel, has been quite resistant to economic cycles
en_quotes.author: Dara Khosrowshahi

en_quotes.quote: I see travelling as a great learning process, and my biggest dream is to travel the world
en_quotes.author: Pooja Hegde

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel, but hate to arrive
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The cool thing about being famous is traveling. I have always wanted to travel across seas, like to Canada and stuff
en_quotes.author: Britney Spears

en_quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can travel at the speed of light, they say, forgetful of the shadow's speed
en_quotes.author: Howard Nemerov

en_quotes.quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

en_quotes.quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow
en_quotes.author: Lin Yutang

en_quotes.quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Travel is a lot like love
en_quotes.author: Alain de Botton

en_quotes.quote: Travel is impossible, but daydreaming about travel is easy
en_quotes.author: B. J. Novak

en_quotes.quote: I just travel the world with my backpack and my cameras and a bunch of Clif bars
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Paris is always a good idea
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: There are few places you can find silence. Air travel could be the last fortress of solitude
en_quotes.author: Regina Brett

en_quotes.quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Travel in all the four quarters of the earth, yet you will find nothing anywhere. Whatever there is, is only here
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: I dislike feeling at home when I am abroad
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: You and I come by road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: I fly economy. I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant
en_quotes.author: Gene Simmons

en_quotes.quote: The bottom line is that time travel is allowed by the laws of physics
en_quotes.author: Brian Greene

en_quotes.quote: The everyday kindness of the back roads more than makes up for the acts of greed in the headlines
en_quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

en_quotes.quote: I always pack a travel snack bag. You don't want to get stuck without snacks no matter where you go!
en_quotes.author: Busy Philipps

en_quotes.quote: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: A zero-gravity flight is a first step toward space travel
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: I am blessed to have been able to travel the world doing what I do
en_quotes.author: Skepta

en_quotes.quote: If your work requires you to travel, you will understand that there's no vacation destination like home
en_quotes.author: Park Chan-wook

en_quotes.quote: It's funny. You travel all over the world, and you wind up with a guy from your hometown
en_quotes.author: Patty Smyth

en_quotes.quote: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Travel teaches toleration
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Of all possible subjects, travel is the most difficult for an artist, as it is the easiest for a journalist
en_quotes.author: W. H. Auden

en_quotes.quote: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: In my early years, I would travel 56 km. from home to the training institute and back every single day
en_quotes.author: P. V. Sindhu

en_quotes.quote: I am very lucky to have the opportunity to travel to so many amazing destinations for work!
en_quotes.author: Brad Goreski

en_quotes.quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls
en_quotes.author: Anais Nin

en_quotes.quote: I'll bring my grits when I travel, because I get so hungry on the road
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: You develop a sympathy for all human beings when you travel a lot
en_quotes.author: Shakuntala Devi

en_quotes.quote: You know more of a road by having traveled it than by all the conjectures and descriptions in the world
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: Technology doesn't address everything - for example, air travel still sucks
en_quotes.author: Brad Feld

en_quotes.quote: I get very homesick, but otherwise it's a great privilege to get to travel for work
en_quotes.author: Jesse Eisenberg

en_quotes.quote: I travel a lot, and I hunt for fabrics, then I have the tailor make me something
en_quotes.author: Waris Ahluwalia

en_quotes.quote: I'm happy because I won't have to train again, or travel or sit in team hotels
en_quotes.author: Romario

en_quotes.quote: I got to work for my hero and travel with him on a regular basis. It doesn't get much better than that for a job
en_quotes.author: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

en_quotes.quote: All my books reflect travel adventures of some kind, and all have a soul: a spiritual or mystical underpinning
en_quotes.author: O. R. Melling

en_quotes.quote: Rail travel for me is the most relaxing, most scenic way to see the country
en_quotes.author: John Paul DeJoria

en_quotes.quote: The travel writer seeks the world we have lost - the lost valleys of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Alexander Cockburn

en_quotes.quote: The photograph reverses the purpose of travel, which until now had been to encounter the strange and unfamiliar
en_quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

en_quotes.quote: Everyone carries his own inch rule of taste, and amuses himself by applying it, triumphantly, wherever he travels
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: To bring up a child in the way he should go, travel that way yourself once in a while
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: If you have enthusiasm, you have a very dynamic, effective companion to travel with you on the road to Somewhere
en_quotes.author: Loretta Young

en_quotes.quote: It's wonderful to travel with somebody that you love and we never travel anywhere without one another
en_quotes.author: Roger Moore

en_quotes.quote: In America there are two classes of travel - first class, and with children
en_quotes.author: Robert Benchley

en_quotes.quote: When you ghost hunt, you kind of time travel: you get that residue of the past
en_quotes.author: Zak Bagans

en_quotes.quote: I'd love to time travel
en_quotes.author: Sam Heughan

en_quotes.quote: When I explained my business model to my family, they asked if I was going to open a travel agency
en_quotes.author: Bhavish Aggarwal

en_quotes.quote: I am not a great cook, I am not a great artist, but I love art, and I love food, so I am the perfect traveller
en_quotes.author: Michael Palin

en_quotes.quote: I am sort of an adventurer. I like to explore new places. I don't get to travel as often as I would like but I love it
en_quotes.author: Edi Gathegi

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel, so I visit a lot of places
en_quotes.author: Song Hye-kyo

en_quotes.quote: Money is not it for me. I love to travel and take care of my kids and be around my children
en_quotes.author: Bobby Lashley

en_quotes.quote: Why not travel, why not see the rest of the world, why not experience life? It's beautiful! Phenomenal!
en_quotes.author: Chita Rivera

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel, I love to go out with my friends, but what I love most is being home with my family
en_quotes.author: Deborah Raney

en_quotes.quote: The gift of sobriety is clarity and a sense of connection - and travel only enhances that
en_quotes.author: J. Maarten Troost

en_quotes.quote: When I travel, I always have about 40 pairs of skis with me, plus a ski technician and a ski coach
en_quotes.author: Julia Mancuso

en_quotes.quote: I'm a bad traveller because I suffer from travel sickness
en_quotes.author: Miranda Raison

en_quotes.quote: London is a roost for every bird
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: The one thing I regret was that my work required an enormous amount of my time, and a lot of travel
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: I do have to travel a lot for speaking engagements
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: We travel often to Asia, Africa, Europe, where they were born
en_quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

en_quotes.quote: It is not fit that every man should travel; it makes a wise man better, and a fool worse
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: We all become great explorers during our first few days in a new city, or a new love affair
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: You should make travel as comfortable as possible
en_quotes.author: Tom Segura

en_quotes.quote: No matter how you travel, it's still you going
en_quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

en_quotes.quote: I travel for work, but recently, friends said I should take major trips
en_quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

en_quotes.quote: I travel without barely any luggage. Just a second set of underwear and binoculars and a map and a toothbrush
en_quotes.author: Werner Herzog

en_quotes.quote: You get educated by traveling
en_quotes.author: Solange Knowles

en_quotes.quote: It was a secular cathedral, dedicated to the rites of travel
en_quotes.author: Robert Hughes

en_quotes.quote: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go
en_quotes.author: Truman Capote

en_quotes.quote: The fact that I stay anonymous means I can exhibit wherever I want. No one knows my name, so it's easy for me to travel
en_quotes.author: JR

en_quotes.quote: I do my best work alone. I travel alone a lot
en_quotes.author: Seth Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Any time I have any time off, I try to travel
en_quotes.author: Margot Robbie

en_quotes.quote: Our career is a dream. I mean, we get to act, travel around the world, and meet cool people. What's not to love!
en_quotes.author: Mary-Kate Olsen

en_quotes.quote: Being able to travel across the world and meet all the different fans is super rewarding
en_quotes.author: Naomi

en_quotes.quote: I would travel only by horse, if I had the choice
en_quotes.author: Linda McCartney

en_quotes.quote: I'm fascinated with being able to travel the world via 'Instagram' and just be somewhere different
en_quotes.author: Mike Krieger

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel, but sometimes it's nice to stay in one place
en_quotes.author: Gustavo Dudamel

en_quotes.quote: Travel takes a toll on you
en_quotes.author: Eva Gutowski

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with travelling back later on is that you can never repeat the same experience
en_quotes.author: Michael Palin

en_quotes.quote: Whenever I travel abroad, I try to visit U.S. troops just to say thanks
en_quotes.author: Chris Murphy

en_quotes.quote: Closed timelike curve' is the jargon for time travel. It means you go out, come back and meet yourself in the past
en_quotes.author: Kip Thorne

en_quotes.quote: I travel on my own and try to - I float along to music
en_quotes.author: Enzo Amore

en_quotes.quote: I might have been born in a hovel but I am determined to travel with the wind and the stars
en_quotes.author: Jacqueline Cochran

en_quotes.quote: In Italy, they add work and life on to food and wine
en_quotes.author: Robin Leach

en_quotes.quote: I was home-schooled. But going to high school, I never would've been able to travel the U.S. or been able to do acting
en_quotes.author: Ethan Embry

en_quotes.quote: I travel so much for work that when I fly, I prefer to travel light and bring a carry-on bag that I don't need to check
en_quotes.author: Behati Prinsloo

en_quotes.quote: At one point, I wanted to be a wildlife photographer. I also love to travel, so maybe I'd do travel writing
en_quotes.author: Nithya Menen

en_quotes.quote: I stay in a lot of hotels, and the best part of travel is getting back to my own bed
en_quotes.author: Michael Bastian

en_quotes.quote: Travel is the best and probably cheapest graduate school you can buy
en_quotes.author: Tom Freston

en_quotes.quote: The largest single reason for disappointing travel experiences is the failure to plan properly
en_quotes.author: Michael Frome

en_quotes.quote: When Bangladesh refused to renew my passport, I used U.N. travel documents. You can't disown your country
en_quotes.author: Taslima Nasrin

en_quotes.quote: Traveloka is the clear online travel leader in Indonesia and is expanding aggressively throughout Southeast Asia
en_quotes.author: Dara Khosrowshahi

en_quotes.quote: Traveling is the ruin of all happiness! There's no looking at a building after seeing Italy
en_quotes.author: Frances Burney

en_quotes.quote: Every day is intense and alive, whether it's travel, work, even down time, which there is so little of
en_quotes.author: Josh Lucas

en_quotes.quote: I like the opportunity to travel the world and work in close company with other people
en_quotes.author: Marc Garneau

en_quotes.quote: The travel and tourism industry, it's just a huge part of our economy
en_quotes.author: Karen Hughes

en_quotes.quote: I really love mountain sports, hiking, skiing, and I love to travel and get to know different places and cultures
en_quotes.author: Ruth Reinhardt

en_quotes.quote: Within 10 years it will be impossible to travel to the North Pole by dog team. There will be too much open water
en_quotes.author: Will Steger

en_quotes.quote: I think young people should travel and travel often to other countries... like I do
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: The Bad Seeds are a band I will travel a great distance to see whenever possible
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: I don't really shop a lot. I order things online. When I travel, I'll get some pieces along the way
en_quotes.author: Lizzo

en_quotes.quote: Fuel prices are at the center of our lives. They affect our ability to travel, stay warm, and feed ourselves
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: One of the places I'd like to travel to is Ibiza, off the coast of Spain
en_quotes.author: Rob Gronkowski

en_quotes.quote: I want to teach. I want to speak. I want to travel
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: I don't feel restless, I just like to travel
en_quotes.author: Brad Pitt

en_quotes.quote: I think a major element of jetlag is psychological. Nobody ever tells me what time it is at home
en_quotes.author: David Attenborough

en_quotes.quote: Before the BBC, I joined the Navy in order to travel
en_quotes.author: David Attenborough

en_quotes.quote: We are not coaching on a daily basis because we often travel with our charity and commercial interests
en_quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

en_quotes.quote: I just don't see myself as a travel writer. I can't. I don't
en_quotes.author: Robyn Davidson

en_quotes.quote: Because it's cheaper and easier to fly than ever before, air travel is becoming democratized
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: I always want off-the-beaten-path, Anthony Bourdain-inspired travel
en_quotes.author: Meghan Markle

en_quotes.quote: I love Ralph Lauren. As I travel so much, I prefer to shop online
en_quotes.author: Meghan Markle

en_quotes.quote: A wise traveler never despises his own country
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: I go on walks during lunch breaks and travel with a fold-up yoga mat. I also love reading by candlelight at night
en_quotes.author: Rachel Boston

en_quotes.quote: Space travel for everyone is the next frontier in the human experience
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: I would love to be a travel writer. I'd be so stoked
en_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: My mom loved fashion. We loved to travel and go to Italy and Paris
en_quotes.author: Melania Trump

en_quotes.quote: When you travel so many weeks a year, it's always nice to have a home-cooked meal
en_quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

en_quotes.quote: Young people should travel, and they don't. You can't know if you don't go
en_quotes.author: Quincy Jones

en_quotes.quote: I travel like a maniac. I travel more than anyone I know. I love learning the languages
en_quotes.author: Quincy Jones

en_quotes.quote: I want to see friends more and travel more
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

en_quotes.quote: I was born to travel and write verse
en_quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

en_quotes.quote: I travel in so many different ways; I travel high, I rough it... it all depends on who I travel with
en_quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

en_quotes.quote: Travel, of course, narrows the mind
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

en_quotes.quote: Science fiction is filled with Martians and space travel to other planets, and things like that
en_quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

en_quotes.quote: An English man does not travel to see English men
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: You travel, and there's Eagles fans everywhere
en_quotes.author: Nick Foles

en_quotes.quote: I do think that travel can be part of a journey of inner maturation, but you've got to do it right
en_quotes.author: Alain de Botton

en_quotes.quote: I hate to travel. I don't go anywhere
en_quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

en_quotes.quote: I take a cooking class everywhere I travel. I find it's the best way to get to know a culture
en_quotes.author: Blake Lively

en_quotes.quote: Know how to travel from your town to a nearby town without a car, either by bus or by rail
en_quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

en_quotes.quote: I always tell people, 'The music's free. I get paid to travel.'
en_quotes.author: Chris Stapleton

en_quotes.quote: I travel all over the country making speeches for people I believe in
en_quotes.author: Ann Richards

en_quotes.quote: Christmas to a child is the first terrible proof that to travel hopefully is better than to arrive
en_quotes.author: Stephen Fry

en_quotes.quote: I want to travel overseas and help out people all over the world
en_quotes.author: Chance The Rapper

en_quotes.quote: I'm living my dream right now. I get to make music, perform and travel
en_quotes.author: Ville Valo

en_quotes.quote: I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant
en_quotes.author: Gene Simmons

en_quotes.quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land
en_quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

en_quotes.quote: I travel a lot and rarely make it home to Seattle
en_quotes.author: Hope Solo

en_quotes.quote: People travel north from Barcelona, not south
en_quotes.author: Jose Andres

en_quotes.quote: Touring can be tough; the crew and I travel everywhere by a big pink bus, and live in petrol stations
en_quotes.author: Marina and the Diamonds

en_quotes.quote: You know it's only 50 miles from Grand River to Canton, but it took me 67 years to travel that distance
en_quotes.author: Don Shula

en_quotes.quote: My ideal travel companions are my family
en_quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

en_quotes.quote: I'm a travel enthusiast
en_quotes.author: Iggy Pop

en_quotes.quote: The way I look at it, people pay me to travel. Once we get to the stage, that part is easy
en_quotes.author: Dianne Reeves

en_quotes.quote: I generally travel with my laptop, a couple of great books, and my iPod
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: When I haven't been working I've tried to travel a lot
en_quotes.author: Emma Watson

en_quotes.quote: I'm a little bit phobic about stains on my clothes, so I never travel without a little packet of organic stain remover
en_quotes.author: John Malkovich

en_quotes.quote: Chicago is an October sort of city even in spring
en_quotes.author: Nelson Algren

en_quotes.quote: I travel a lot. I'm on the move
en_quotes.author: Ted Turner

en_quotes.quote: I take my Bible with me, sometimes two of them, when I travel
en_quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

en_quotes.quote: My fans are honestly so unique and so similar. Wherever I travel, they are so, so different but so the same
en_quotes.author: Lilly Singh

en_quotes.quote: When I go on Japanese Airlines, I really love it because I like Japanese food
en_quotes.author: Phil Collins

en_quotes.quote: I travel continuously, and I see many cities, but there is nowhere like London
en_quotes.author: Norman Foster

en_quotes.quote: The good news is that real-world hands-on conservation is alive and well and catching on across the America I travel
en_quotes.author: Ted Nugent

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel, anywhere in the world. Wherever it is... India... Tibet... wherever. I'll go anywhere
en_quotes.author: Guillermo del Toro

en_quotes.quote: Europe is one of the best travel destinations in the world
en_quotes.author: Marco Bizzarri

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel. This is the time for me. When will I do it if not now?
en_quotes.author: Rakul Preet Singh

en_quotes.quote: I just can't do heels any more. At least not when I'm working. I travel a lot
en_quotes.author: Victoria Beckham

en_quotes.quote: The holidays are the worst time to travel, and ISIS aren't making things any easier
en_quotes.author: Katherine Ryan

en_quotes.quote: As a model, I travel non-stop
en_quotes.author: Jasmine Guinness

en_quotes.quote: I started out thinking I was going to play in the NBA; now I travel the world as a WWE Superstar. Life changes
en_quotes.author: Big Show

en_quotes.quote: I think that you certainly don't have to be aged and travel the world to write a poem
en_quotes.author: Rita Dove

en_quotes.quote: I'm going to do more movies and travel
en_quotes.author: Tommy Wiseau

en_quotes.quote: If you travel to Germany, it's still absolutely Germany. If you travel to Sweden, it still has a Swedish identity
en_quotes.author: Morrissey

en_quotes.quote: Why, I'd like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip
en_quotes.author: Aristophanes

en_quotes.quote: The joke we always say is that WWE doesn't pay us to wrestle, they pay us to travel
en_quotes.author: Seth Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Most of my workouts happen by myself because I travel so much
en_quotes.author: Seth Rollins

en_quotes.quote: When I was starting out, it was almost impossible for me to get visas to travel to tournaments
en_quotes.author: Ana Ivanovic

en_quotes.quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee
en_quotes.author: Helen Hayes

en_quotes.quote: With Pakistan being in my blood, I would certainly look at opportunities to travel there
en_quotes.author: Nargis Fakhri

en_quotes.quote: Football is one side of me. Art is another. Travel is another
en_quotes.author: Dhani Jones

en_quotes.quote: I want everybody to travel, to travel and not be afraid
en_quotes.author: Dhani Jones

en_quotes.quote: I travel a lot, so it's hard to always fit in a workout
en_quotes.author: Stella Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: I do love traveling, so I've been able to travel a lot
en_quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

en_quotes.quote: There's going to be space travel at some point
en_quotes.author: Anne Wojcicki

en_quotes.quote: There's so much interest and curiosity about alien life, interstellar travel. It's always in the news
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Hammer

en_quotes.quote: Physical books are still my favorite, but I own an e-book reader. They're convenient for travel
en_quotes.author: Jesmyn Ward

en_quotes.quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going
en_quotes.author: Paul Theroux

en_quotes.quote: Travel is glamorous only in retrospect
en_quotes.author: Paul Theroux

en_quotes.quote: Extensive traveling induces a feeling of encapsulation, and travel, so broadening at first, contracts the mind
en_quotes.author: Paul Theroux

en_quotes.quote: Travel works best when you're forced to come to terms with the place you're in
en_quotes.author: Paul Theroux

en_quotes.quote: The amount of hassle involved in travel can be overwhelming
en_quotes.author: Paul Theroux

en_quotes.quote: The job of the travel writer is to go far and wide, to make voluminous notes, to tell the truth
en_quotes.author: Paul Theroux

en_quotes.quote: In between films I like to travel and hope to visit every continent before I become a mother
en_quotes.author: Diane Kruger

en_quotes.quote: There are few aspects of everyday life that aren't touched by the technologies developed for space travel
en_quotes.author: Scott Kelly

en_quotes.quote: I didn't have the money to travel until I got to the NFL, so it's definitely opened doors for me in that capacity
en_quotes.author: DeAngelo Williams

en_quotes.quote: I travel all over the country, all over the world, and I'm happy to call Texas home
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Walker

en_quotes.quote: I'm obsessed with the moon and space travel, so if I could incorporate that, I'd love to go to space
en_quotes.author: Sam Heughan

en_quotes.quote: I travel. I do a lot of traveling around the world
en_quotes.author: Chris Tucker

en_quotes.quote: I really have to dance more often, and so I travel around. If I don't, I will crumble
en_quotes.author: Rudolf Nureyev

en_quotes.quote: I'm pretty low-key. I travel fairly light, especially on the tour
en_quotes.author: Christine McVie

en_quotes.quote: I run five miles three times a week; I log everything. I look up routes when I travel
en_quotes.author: Kevin Plank

en_quotes.quote: I hate to travel
en_quotes.author: Pierre Nanterme

en_quotes.quote: Certain travellers give the impression that they keep moving because only then do they feel fully alive
en_quotes.author: Ella Maillart

en_quotes.quote: The time to enjoy a European trip is about three weeks after unpacking
en_quotes.author: George Ade

en_quotes.quote: I don't live lavishly, so it's not like I have 20 assistants and travel privately and shop every day
en_quotes.author: Mila Kunis

en_quotes.quote: I got to travel a lot and meet amazing people. That was a lot of fun
en_quotes.author: Bhavish Aggarwal

en_quotes.quote: Most people travel outside of Australia. They don't realise what we've got
en_quotes.author: Nick Cummins

en_quotes.quote: I wanted to travel from the beginning. As a kid, I used to dream about airplanes, before I ever flew in one
en_quotes.author: Mary Ellen Mark

en_quotes.quote: No matter where I've been overseas, the food stinks, except in Italy
en_quotes.author: Carmen Electra

en_quotes.quote: One of the sad truths about leadership is that, the higher up the ladder you travel, the less you know
en_quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

en_quotes.quote: Two great talkers will not travel far together
en_quotes.author: George Borrow

en_quotes.quote: If I could travel back in time, I'd bring back the entire Wu-Tang Clan
en_quotes.author: Hannah Simone

en_quotes.quote: When I'm in London I always travel by public transport - I catch the Tube and the Heathrow Express
en_quotes.author: Rajeev Suri

en_quotes.quote: Some minds improve by travel, others, rather, resemble copper wire, or brass, which get the narrower by going farther
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hood

en_quotes.quote: I've been around the block. I travel a lot to gyms
en_quotes.author: Ben Askren

en_quotes.quote: Travel is very subjective. What one person loves, another loathes
en_quotes.author: Robin Leach

en_quotes.quote: I have gotten to travel the world and experience all these incredible things thanks to my career
en_quotes.author: Karlie Kloss

en_quotes.quote: Travel is the frivolous part of serious lives, and the serious part of frivolous ones
en_quotes.author: Sophie Swetchine

en_quotes.quote: Travel is hard, but entertaining is joy
en_quotes.author: Debbie Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: I love getting oxygen facials because I travel a lot. My skin gets pretty dry with all the airplanes
en_quotes.author: Lily Collins

en_quotes.quote: Travel gives me the opportunity to walk through the sectors of cities where one can clearly see the passage of time
en_quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

en_quotes.quote: I feel so lucky to have the career that I have. I can travel the world and be a goofball and make people laugh
en_quotes.author: Colleen Ballinger

en_quotes.quote: I do not have any pets. We travel too much
en_quotes.author: Nancy Kerrigan

en_quotes.quote: I am a passionate traveler, and from the time I was a child, travel formed me as much as my formal education
en_quotes.author: David Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: If you travel first class, you think first class and you are more likely to play first class
en_quotes.author: Raymond Floyd

en_quotes.quote: I love listening to music on holiday, and back in the old days, I used to travel with cassette tapes and a boombox
en_quotes.author: Art Malik

en_quotes.quote: A lot of my travel is at least partly work, visiting schools and libraries, especially in France
en_quotes.author: Quentin Blake

en_quotes.quote: I live in Chicago, but my work is always in New York or L.A., so I always have to travel for my job
en_quotes.author: Kristin Cavallari

en_quotes.quote: Airline travel is hours of boredom interrupted by moments of stark terror
en_quotes.author: Al Boliska

en_quotes.quote: I get pretty much all the exercise I need walking down airport concourses carrying bags
en_quotes.author: Guy Clark

en_quotes.quote: While Expedia is outbound-focused, Wotif is much more about domestic travel
en_quotes.author: Dara Khosrowshahi

en_quotes.quote: I love to travel. I'm a curious person
en_quotes.author: Hilary Swank

en_quotes.quote: Traveling is seeing; it is the implicit that we travel by
en_quotes.author: Cynthia Ozick

en_quotes.quote: To travel America and see everything it has to offer, with my best friend, sounds like the perfect road trip
en_quotes.author: Holly Marie Combs

en_quotes.quote: New York is the great stone desert
en_quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

en_quotes.quote: I've been lucky enough to travel the world and win awards and medals, but it was time to stop
en_quotes.author: Natalie du Toit

en_quotes.quote: Amtrak offers riders a cost-effective way to travel throughout the country
en_quotes.author: Tim Bishop

en_quotes.quote: I travel a lot; I hate having my life disrupted by routine
en_quotes.author: Caskie Stinnett

en_quotes.quote: My wife and I have so much fun when we travel and find anything... like stray cats and squirrels
en_quotes.author: Eric Roberts

en_quotes.quote: On long haul flights I always drink loads and loads of water and eat light and healthy food
en_quotes.author: Lisa Snowdon

en_quotes.quote: The hardest part is to travel, and to be away from your family
en_quotes.author: Glenn Tipton

en_quotes.quote: Lovers of air travel find it exhilarating to hang poised between the illusion of immortality and the fact of death
en_quotes.author: Alexander Chase

en_quotes.quote: A journey by Sea and Land, Five Hundred Miles, is not undertaken without money
en_quotes.author: Lewis Hallam
